title: Sawbones: Modern Day Snake Oil Salespeople
description:
Often on Sawbones, we talk about pushers of false cures as if snake oil is a relic of a bygone era. This week on a special MaxFunDrive episode of Sawbones, a reminder that snake oil salespeople are just a present as ever.

DONATE NOW!

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
